alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 12 at 12:20PM EST until March 13 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches for a storm total of 6 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...The Champlain Valley of Vermont and New York. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Moderate to periodically heavy snow this afternoon will taper off this evening and come to an end by Sunday morning. Gusty northwest winds up to 45 mph will develop this afternoon and continue into the overnight hours. Blowing snow may develop and significantly reduce visibility across the region.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
